   NO INSTALL/UNRAR & PLAY    

    Half-Life 2: Episode Two is the second of a series of stand-alone episodes 
    based on HL2,  the  popular and  acclaimed  shooter  epic.  Armed with new 
    weaponry and vehicles, Dr. Gordon Freeman must race through a countryside 
    riddled with an increasingly feirce Combine threat.
